name: Unison 22
description:
Unison 22 is a Visual Novel all about Music and Love made by 11C!

The current version is a demo made for NaNoRenO and is subject to change (a lot!).

The Android version was more of a second thought during development, so some features that are on the pc version won't work the same on Android.

(Press F11 to put the game in Full Screen! - A during a Story to bring up the Dialog Menu. You can also click on the little arrow on the top left!)

SCENARIO:

You play as a part-time worker that loves to play rhythm games and to enjoy some sweet time at Unison 22. But one night, the person you like suddenly makes a proposition that you have been waiting for...

This game was made in Godot Engine!

THE TEAM:

Follow our official Twitter Account! @11CGaming

@YumaRowen - Developer,  Artist,  Scenario

@haijou_parade - Writer, Character Design

@CantarellaRose - Writer, Character Design

@strawberrymahou - Scenario

@mounttwin - Character Design, Artist (Initial Sketches)
